definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] dub.; only in [[כְּרוּב מִמְשַׁח]] [[הַסּוֹכֵח]] Ez Eze 28:14 cherub of expansion (then c. As. mašâhu, measure, Aram. [[מְשַׁח]] id., etc.) that covereth, after Vulgate cherub extentus (far-reaching wings), &ld; far-covering cherub, &rd; Ew (Or “ umspannender ”); the anointed cherub that covereth, AV RV, so Hä. Co thinks gloss, and reads [[אֶת־כְּרוּב]] [[נְתַתִּיְ]]; text dub. acc. to Siegf:Kau SS Buhl Berthol.
